trans-unit.source: The ColorMatrix structure contains a 5×5 matrix of real numbers. Several methods of the ImageAttributes class adjust image colors by using a color matrix

seg-source.mrk: The ColorMatrix structure contains a 5×5 matrix of real numbers.
Several methods of the ImageAttributes class adjust image colors by using a color matrix

target.mrk: The ColorMatrix structure contains a 5×5 matrix of real numbers.
Several methods of the ImageAttributes class adjust image colors by using a color matrix

trans-unit.source: A 5×5 color matrix is a homogeneous matrix for a 4-space transformation.

seg-source.mrk: A 5×5 color matrix is a homogeneous matrix for a 4-space transformation.

target.mrk: A 5×5 color matrix is a homogeneous matrix for a 4-space transformation.

trans-unit.source: The element in the fifth row and fifth column of a 5×5 homogeneous matrix must be 1, and all of the other elements in the fifth column must be 0.

seg-source.mrk: The element in the fifth row and fifth column of a 5×5 homogeneous matrix must be 1, and all of the other elements in the fifth column must be 0.

target.mrk: The element in the fifth row and fifth column of a 5×5 homogeneous matrix must be 1, and all of the other elements in the fifth column must be 0.

trans-unit.source: Color matrices are used to transform color vectors.

seg-source.mrk: Color matrices are used to transform color vectors.

target.mrk: Color matrices are used to transform color vectors.

trans-unit.source: The first four components of a color vector hold the red, green, blue, and alpha components (in that order) of a color.

seg-source.mrk: The first four components of a color vector hold the red, green, blue, and alpha components (in that order) of a color.

target.mrk: The first four components of a color vector hold the red, green, blue, and alpha components (in that order) of a color.

trans-unit.source: The fifth component of a color vector is always 1.

seg-source.mrk: The fifth component of a color vector is always 1.

target.mrk: The fifth component of a color vector is always 1.
